Text: HakluytDear Mr Skilling Following Phil Carrolls letter to you of April I would be delighted to call on you to tell you more about Hakluyt While we have already done some work for Enron Scott Tholan virtually all our work for our clients is at a strategic level where our coverage of issues is of greatest value With your challenging international objectives I am confident we could be of value to you If you would find it useful to meet I will contact your office to arrange a suitable time Yours sincerely Christopher James This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential and intended solely for the use of the individual or entity to whom they are addressed If you have received this email in error please notify the system manager This footnote also confirms that this email message has been swept by MIMEsweeper for the presence of computer viruses
